about-two-title: For inquiries please contact us at:
about-one-content:
We are leading institute to provide Tuition from class 4th to 12th Online & Offline both mode, VedusOne Academy is own by Ms. Panna Gupta, She is Prop. of VedusOne Academy, We provide coaching to student on both Medium of Student Hindi & English, Our All Courses basically made on NCERT or CBSE based pattern, You can also learn about all Computer Courses from our website, and you can also learn SOL DU based courses, we also provide coaching to B.com, M.Com, MBA, BBA, MCA students, We have team of 150+ Teacher who are giving their best to teach student with simple or easy method to understand,


With Regards,
VedusOne Academy Team
about-two-content: For all other inquiries, visit our  Contact Us  page.
